name: Murmillo vs Murmillo
description:
Murmillo vs Murmillo

Zeus demands entertainment!

Nameless Murmillos, you shall battle one-on-one to the death. May the best gladiator win!

----

A frantic local 2-player fighting game.

Hit your opponent with the bomb to curse them, and ensure you don't have the curse when the time runs out.

Best played using gamepads.

----

Controls

  • D-pad: Move and aim
  • A: Jump
  • B: Throw
  • Start: (Re)start
  • Select: Toggle music

If required, **keyboard** controls are:

P1

  • W/A/S/D: Move and aim
  • F: Jump
  • G: Throw
  • Enter: (Re)start
  • Y: Toggle music

P2

  • Arrow keys: Move and aim
  • Comma: Jump
  • Full stop: Throw
